医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明蛋白质能够预测多种疾病的发生对从一滴血液中测量的数千种蛋白质进行的研究表明，蛋白质能够预测许多不同疾病的发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-shows-the-ability-of- Proteins-to-predict-onset-of-many-diverse-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Research-shows-the-ability-of- Proteins-to-predict-onset-of-many-diverse-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=727fc2cb-f3ae-44b6-a341-4ae8a5b70f92 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:14:05 -0400 Research shows the ability of proteins to predict onset of many diverse diseases
罕见病诊断的创新遗传学方法大多数罕见病都有遗传原因。潜在的遗传改变越来越容易被发现，例如通过外显子组测序（ES），从而进行分子遗传学诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Innovative-genic-approaches-to-rare-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Innovative-genic-approaches-to-rare-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cf441a8-7d29-49bb-9dc9-cd8bd535a373 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 13:57:00 -0400 Innovative genetic approaches to rare disease diagnosis
了解消费者同意的数据以优化数字健康计划在本次采访中，News Medical 与 LexisNexis® Risk Solutions 的医疗保健业务部门讨论了如何通过更好地了解消费者同意的数据来优化临床试验筛查和数字健康计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Understanding-Consumer-Consented-Data-to-Optimize-Digital-Health-Programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Understanding-Consumer-Consented-Data-to-Optimize-Digital-Health-Programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d064b617-2c62-4d58-80f3-4f12bf79e105 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 11:35:00 -0400 Understanding Consumer-Consented Data to Optimize Digital Health Programs
阿姆斯特丹联合医学公司将领导欧洲财团寻找手术团队压力的解决方案平均而言，参与医院外科手术和护理的医疗保健专业人员比欧洲其他专业群体承受更大的压力和倦怠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Amsterdam-UMC-to-lead-European-consortium-in-search-of-solutions-to-stress-among-surgical-team.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Amsterdam-UMC-to-lead-European-consortium-in-search-of-solutions-to-stress-among-surgical-team.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb0eb232-e9fd-478a-88e4-2c94c19b8d72 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 08:49:03 -0400 Amsterdam UMC to lead European consortium in search of solutions to stress among surgical team
新的肾移植联合细胞疗法有助于减少供体特异性免疫反应一种新的肾移植联合细胞疗法可以帮助减少针对移植器官的供体特异性反应，而无需维持三重免疫抑制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/New-combined-cell-therapy-for-kidney-transplants-can-help-reduce-donor-specific-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/New-combined-cell-therapy-for-kidney-transplants-can-help-reduce-donor-specific-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89d60273-d130-4925-9554-137dfe28904d Mon, 22 Jul 2024 08:42:42 -0400 New combined cell therapy for kidney transplants can help reduce donor-specific immune response
大脑耦合模式作为 22q11.2DS 精神病的预测标记UNIGE 团队表明，某些大脑区域之间的过强或过弱的互连可能是该疾病的预测标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Brain-coupling-patterns-as-predictive-markers-for-psychosis-in-22q112DS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Brain-coupling-patterns-as-predictive-markers-for-psychosis-in-22q112DS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbb42072-10f1-4048-a3b0-b2b5043a4cd8 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 08:11:33 -0400 Brain coupling patterns as predictive markers for psychosis in 22q11.2DS
结合三种现有药物的联合疗法显示出治疗视网膜变性的潜力根据国际研究小组在《自然通讯》上发表的一项新研究，药物的重新利用显示出治疗视网膜变性的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Combination-therapy-incorporating- Three-existing-drugs-shows-potential-for-treating-retinal-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Combination-therapy-incorporating- Three-existing-drugs-shows-potential-for-treating-retinal-de Generations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55bd30b3-bb2c-4328-b273-f9f76699b976 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 07:03:45 -0400 Combination therapy incorporating three existing drugs shows potential for treating retinal degenerations
增强人类智力：健康衰老和记忆的策略加拿大一位著名学者表示，人们可以通过适当锻炼大脑而不是谷歌搜索来降低患与年龄相关的痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Empowering- human-intelligence-Strategies-for-healthy-aging-and-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Empowering- human-intelligence-Strategies-for-healthy-aging-and-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eee317e2-86f3-44ae-a006-a2abec742908 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 06:54:43 -0400 Empowering human intelligence: Strategies for healthy aging and memory
杜克大学-新加坡国立大学推出 LIVE Ventures 以促进学术研究的商业化杜克-新加坡国立大学医学院今天启动了 LIVE Ventures，这是一项价值 2000 万新元的孵化计划，旨在促进创新学术研究的商业化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Duke-NUS-unveils-LIVE-Ventures-to-catalyze-the-commercialization-of-academic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Duke-NUS-unveils-LIVE-Ventures-to-catalyze-the-commercialization-of-academic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=776fa874-cad9-45e0-846c-d534288eae9d Mon, 22 Jul 2024 06:49:34 -0400 Duke-NUS unveils LIVE Ventures to catalyze the commercialization of academic research
罕见肿瘤研究的挑战和机遇中国医学科学院和中国协和医学院的李宁等人对罕见肿瘤研究和管理领域的挑战和机遇进行了全面回顾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Challenges-and-opportunities-in-rare-tumor-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Challenges-and-opportunities-in-rare-tumor-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf420ee4-2df6-492d-9a6d-c3cc95670f59 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 06:43:34 -0400 Challenges and opportunities in rare tumor research
